#ImportantStuff

Terms and conditions

No one likes reading long-winded, complicated terms and conditions. Sorry.

The Pandimensional Trading Company is a collection of digital artworks (NFTs) running on the Ethereum network. This website is only an interface allowing participants to exchange digital collectibles. Users are entirely responsible for the safety and management of their own private Ethereum wallets and validating all transactions and contracts generated by this website before approval. Furthermore, as the Pandimensional Trading Company smart contract runs on the Ethereum network, there is no ability to undo, reverse, or restore any transactions.

This website and its connected services are provided “as is” and “as available” without warranty of any kind. By using this website you are accepting sole responsibility for any and all transactions involving Pandimensional Trading Club digital collectibles.

Artwork marketed under the Pandimensional Trading Company, Pandimensional Trading Co,, and PTCo. brand name are referred to as “Pandimensionals”.

“The Pandimensional Trading Company”, “Pandimensional Trading Co,”, and “PTCo.” brand names belong to The Pandimensional Trading Company, and ownership of these brand names remains solely the property of the The Pandimensional Trading Company,

i. You Own the NFT. Each Pandimensional artwork is an NFT on the Ethereum blockchain. When you purchase an NFT, you own the underlying Pandimensional creation, the art. The Pandimensional Trading Company retains the right to reproduce, use, and display the artwork in any format, worldwide, without warranty for commercial use, and under no obligation to the NFT owner. Ownership of the NFT is mediated entirely by the Smart Contract and the Ethereum Network: at no point may we seize, freeze, or otherwise modify the ownership of any Pandimensional.

ii. Personal Use. Subject to your continued compliance with these Terms, the Pandimensional Trading Company grants you a worldwide, royalty-free license to use, copy, and display the purchased Art, along with any extensions that you choose to create or use, solely for the following purposes: (i) for your own personal, non-commercial use; (ii) as part of a marketplace that permits the purchase and sale of your Pandimensional / NFT, provided that the marketplace cryptographically verifies each Pandimensinal owner’s rights to display the Art for their Pandimensional artwork to ensure that only the actual owner can display the Art; or (iii) as part of a third party website or application that permits the inclusion, involvement, or participation of your Pandimensional, provided that the website/application cryptographically verifies each Pandimensional owner’s rights to display the Art for their Pandimensional to ensure that only the actual owner can display the Art, and provided that the Art is no longer visible once the owner of the Pandimensional leaves the website/application.

iii. Commercial Use. Subject to your continued compliance with these Terms, the Pandimensional Trading Company grants you an unlimited, worldwide license to use, copy, and display the purchased Art for the purpose of creating derivative works based upon the Art (“Commercial Use”). Examples of such Commercial Use would e.g. be the use of the Art to produce and sell merchandise products (T-Shirts etc.) displaying copies of the Art. For the sake of clarity, nothing in this Section will be deemed to restrict you from (i) owning or operating a marketplace that permits the use and sale of Pandimensionals generally, provided that the marketplace cryptographically verifies each Pandimensional owner’s rights to display the Art for their Pandimensional to ensure that only the actual owner can display the Art; (ii) owning or operating a third party website or application that permits the inclusion, involvement, or participation of Pandimensionals generally, provided that the third party website or application cryptographically verifies each Pandimensionals owner’s rights to display the Art for their Pandimensional to ensure that only the actual owner can display the Art, and provided that the Art is no longer visible once the owner of the Purchased Pandimensionals leaves the website/application; or (iii) earning revenue from any of the foregoing.

iv. Membership of PTCo. is mediated entirely by the Smart Contract and the Ethereum Network: at no point may we seize, freeze, or otherwise modify the membership status of any Pandimensional holder. Access to certain membership benefits, including, but not limited to prints, digital files and voting is subject to a request made by the member via the Member page on this website and received by PTCo. We accept no responsibility for unreceived requests.

v. Submission of ideas for NFT collections is open to members and non-members. We give no guarantee that ideas submitted to PTCo. will result in a business agreement between the submitter and PTCo. Ideas submitted to PTCo. belong solely to the submitter until such time that PTCo. and the submitter complete a formal agreement. 

vi. PTCo. accept no liability for the use of this website. By using this website you are providing your consent that you understand and agree to the terms and conditions on this page.
